info.title: Finboost Back-End
info.description: OpenAPI Swagger Documentation for Finboost Back-End RESTful API

400.description: Failed signup user because validation error

fullName & email empty.description: Fail signup because fullName & email field empty

age & phoneNumber empty.description: Fail signup because age & phoneNumber field empty

409.description: Failed signup user because email already exist

Email already exist.description: Fail signup because email already exist

Database connection error.description: Fail signup due to database connection issue

Unexpected server error.description: Fail signup due to unexpected server error

400.description: Failed sigin user because validation error

email empty.description: Fail signin because email field empty

password empty.description: Fail signin because password field empty

404.description: Failed sigin user because validation error

email not found.description: Fail signin because email can't find

Database connection error.description: Fail sigin due to database connection issue

Unexpected server error.description: Fail sigin due to unexpected server error

not provided refresh token.description: Fail to refresh token because the request not provided refresh token on cookies

value.message: Unauthorized. Please provide `refreshToken` on cookies before request

invalid refresh token.description: Fail to refresh token because invalid refresh token

value.message: Forbidden. Can't find who the owner `refreshToken`

decode error.description: Fail to refresh token because decode error

value.message: Forbidden. Can't decode or compare token with secret

get.description: Refresh the JWT token to get a new access token. The refresh token is expected to be in the cookies.

invalid refresh token.description: Fail to refresh token because invalid refresh token

value.message: Forbidden. Can't find who the owner `refreshToken`

decode error.description: Fail to refresh token because decode error

value.message: Forbidden. Can't decode or compare token with secret

MiddlewareUnauthorizedError.description: Fail to pass through middleware because the request header not provide Authorization Bearer

message.example: Unauthorized. Please provide Bearer `accessToken` on Authorization Header

MiddlewareForbiddenError.description: Fail to pass through middleware because can't decode or comapre token with secret

message.example: Forbidden. Can't decode or compare token with secret
